        super(false, elGamalParameters);
        this.y = bigInteger;

    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
        return (obj instanceof ElGamalPublicKeyParameters) && ((ElGamalPublicKeyParameters) obj).getY().equals(this.y) && super.equals(obj);

        return this.y;
